answerText: molecular orbital theory [or MO theory][10] The simplest molecule, and the only one which has wavefunctions which can be solved exactly, is this one, consisting of two protons and an electron. It can be reduced from the three-body problem if the nuclei are stationary.
heading: ACF Regionals 2014 |2014 | MIT A-Illinois B-Texas A&M A | 11 | Science | Chemistry | College
subject: Science
question: Question:  [10] Name this theory which proposes that atomic orbitals can combine constructively and destructively to form bonding and antibonding orbitals delocalized over an entire compound.
